Mrs. Dashwood.text: Devonshire ! Are you , indeed , going there ? So far from hence ! And to what part of it ? "

but I hope to see many of my friends in it . A room or two can easily be added ; and if my friends find no difficulty in travelling so far to see me , I am sure I will find none in accommodating them . "

Norland.text: when shall I cease to regret you!--when learn to feel a home elsewhere!--Oh ! happy house , could you know what I suffer in now viewing you from this spot , from whence perhaps I may view you no more!--And you , ye well - known trees!--but you will continue the same.--No leaf will decay because we are removed , nor any branch become motionless although we can observe you no longer!--No ; you will continue the same ; unconscious of the pleasure or the regret you occasion , and insensible of any change in those who walk under your shade!--But who will remain to enjoy you ? "
